tick_tock.name: Tick-Tock, the Broken Bard
dialogue: One, two. One, two. You're off beat, little soft one. Squishy. Quiet. Disgusting.
They say the Carillon will ring again. But I like the quiet between the ticks. That's where the music lives... in the rests.
Do you know why the dancers broke? They couldn't hear the silence. Only their own rhythm.
You don't reflect. How curious. Are you even real? Or just a pause in the song?

maintenance_automaton.name: Defunct Maintenance Unit
dialogue: ER...ROR... SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE OVERDUE BY... [DATA CORRUPTED]... CENTURIES.
DO NOT... STEP ON THE... GRASS. IT IS... SHARP.
I CANNOT... FIX... THE SKY. IT IS... TOO BROKEN.
DETECTING... UNAUTHORIZED FREQUENCY... DO NOT USE THE WHISTLE. IT WAKES... THE OLD ROT.

prime_conductor.name: The Prime Conductor
dialogue: Ah... a little Dampener. Awake at last. The world is out of tune, my child.
The Dissonance Kings have stolen the sheet music. They hoard the resonance in their frozen domains.
Begin with Golgotha. He gorges himself on the past, refusing to let the measure end.
Bring me their resonance. Only then can I restart the Grand Carillon and save us all.

golgotha.name: Golgotha, The Accumulation
dialogue: MORE... SCRAP... MORE... TIME...
THE RUST... IT WARMS... ME...
DO NOT... TAKE... MY... GARBAGE...
I AM... HISTORY... DIGESTING... ITSELF...

vitria.name: Vitria, The Glass Matriarch
dialogue: Do not touch the display! You will smudge the perfection!
I froze them to save them! Decay is ugly! Life is messy! Glass is forever!
My garden... my beautiful, silent garden...
Shatter? No... I simply refract.

narcissus.name: Narcissus, The Shattered Idol
dialogue: Who is that? Is that me? No... you are too ugly to be me.
Look at me! LOOK AT ME! wait, don't look, I'm flawed!
The mirror lies! It shows lines that aren't there!
Perfection... is a prison...

vanity_wraith.name: Vanity Wraith
dialogue: My face... where is my face?
Give it back! Give me back my reflection!
It hurts to look... it hurts not to look...

metronome_general.name: The Metronome General
dialogue: TICK. TOCK. MARCH. STOP.
ORDER. MUST. PREVAIL. CHAOS. IS. LATENESS.
YOU ARE 0.4 SECONDS LATE. PUNISHMENT: DELETION.
THE EMPIRE NEVER ENDS. IT JUST REPEATS.

chrono_wraith.name: Chrono-Wraith
dialogue: Yesterday... tomorrow... it's all the same screaming loop.
I killed you already... why are you back?
Time bleeds... and we drown in it.

gear_keeper.name: Gear Keeper
dialogue: Grease... more grease...
The teeth must mesh. The flesh must yield.

cantor.name: Cantor, Voice of the Void
dialogue: There is no song. Only the scream.
I saw the sheet music. It's blank. It's all blank!
Silence! I will shout the world into nothingness!
The void does not listen. It eats.

banshee.name: The Banshee
dialogue: Hush... sleep now...
The end is a lullaby.
Why do you struggle? Silence is peace.

silence_guard.name: Silence Guard
dialogue: Dampen the noise.
Shhh.

paradox.name: The Paradox
dialogue: You are not supposed to be here. This timeline was deleted.
I am the error you refused to fix.
Restart? There is no restart. Only crash.
